          <title>
            <string language="en">Parts of a transformer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teile eines Transformators</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pièces d'un transformateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peças de um transformador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parti di un trasformatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη ενός μετασχηματιστή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Piezas de un transformador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the basic components of a transformer: the primary coil, secondary coil, and the core.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die grundlegenden 
Bestandteile eines Transformators: die Primärspule, 
Sekundärspule und der Kern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les composants de base d'un 
transformateur : l'enroulement primaire, enroulement secondaire,
et le noyau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra os componentes básicos de 
um transformador: a bobina preliminar, bobina secundária, e o 
núcleo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra i componenti di base di un 
trasformatore: la bobina primaria, bobina secondaria ed il 
nucleo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει βασικά συστατικά ενός 
μετασχηματιστή: το αρχικό πηνίο, δευτεροβάθμιο πηνίο, και ο
πυρήνας.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra los componentes básicos de 
un transformador: la bobina primaria, bobina secundaria, y la
